objects.text:
• Energy-efficient Ventless
• Multiple Drying Modes
• Advanced Moisture Sensing
• Sleek Modern Design

product_details.name: Insignia Ultra-Modern High-Efficiency Ventless Dryer - Smart Home Essential
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white modern design with large digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying modes: My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, Towels, and more
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and clear maintenance instructions
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining and cycle status
• 🌟 Large capacity drum with dark glass door for visibility
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensing for precise drying results
• ⚙️ Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 🔄 Reversible door design for flexible installation
• 💡 User-friendly control panel with rotating selector dial
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a modern home appliance on a dark-themed background featuring layered geometric shapes and subtle circular patterns for visual depth. The main product image is prominently displayed on the right, capturing attention with a clean, front-facing view. Text layers are organized clearly, beginning with a bold, all-caps promotional tag ("tagline") at the top, followed by a product name heading ("heading") in softer gray tones. A bullet-pointed highlights section ("description") communicates key product features in fine, legible typography. The pricing ("price") is large and vibrant, complemented by a call-to-action button ("cta") in a rounded rectangle ("cta_background") for urgency. 

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #1F2937 (Background)
- Slate Gray: #374151, #4B5563, #6B7280 (Geometric accents)
- White: #FFFFFF (Primary text)
- Light Gray: #D1D5DB and #F3F4F6 (Body text)
- Warm Gold: #E9AF5C (Price highlight and button fill)
- Charcoal: #1F2937 (Button text)
product_color: This product image of a dryer features a clean, modern color palette centered around minimalism and tech-forward design. Dominated by a sleek **white body** (#F8F8F8), it provides a neutral and fresh base. The **black door** and control panel accents (#1A1A1A) create bold contrast, highlighting functionality while enhancing sophistication. The **digital blue display** (#00BFFF) adds a hint of color and technological flair, subtly popping against the dark background. Metallic silver and grey tones (#C0C0C0, #A9A9A9) on the knob and vents blend seamlessly while drawing attention to user interfaces. These elements together form a balanced aesthetic ideal for a contemporary settings ad banner.
